statements: SELECT * FROM DiseaseSpread;
SELECT disease_name, patient_id FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE transmission_type = 'Airborne';
SELECT patient_id, date_diagnosed FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE date_diagnosed > '2021-01-01';
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM DiseaseSpread GROUP BY disease_name;
SELECT DISTINCT transmission_type FROM DiseaseSpread ORDER BY transmission_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT disease_name, patient_id FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE date_diagnosed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, disease_name FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE transmission_type = 'Airborne' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT disease_name FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE patient_id IN (100, 200, 300);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases, disease_name FROM DiseaseSpread GROUP BY disease_name HAVING total_cases > 1 ORDER BY total_cases DESC;
SELECT * FROM disease_cases WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT disease_type, diagnosis_date FROM disease_cases WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT pattern_name, transmission_mode FROM transmission_patterns WHERE quarantine_required = TRUE;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, transmission_mode FROM transmission_patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM disease_cases WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM disease_cases WHERE patient_id = 123 AND location_id = 5 ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC
SELECT disease_type, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM disease_cases GROUP BY disease_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT pattern_name, transmission_mode FROM transmission_patterns WHERE quarantine_required = true
SELECT disease_type, location_id, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM disease_cases GROUP BY disease_type, location_id ORDER BY total_cases DESC
SELECT * FROM disease_cases JOIN transmission_patterns ON disease_cases.location_id = transmission_patterns.cluster_id
SELECT * FROM diseases_cases;
SELECT patient_id, disease_name, location FROM diseases_cases WHERE location='City A';
SELECT disease_name, location, date_reported FROM diseases_cases ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM diseases_cases;
SELECT disease_name, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM disease_analysis WHERE analysis_result='Positive';
SELECT * FROM diseases_cases WHERE location='New York'
SELECT disease_name, date_reported FROM diseases_cases ORDER BY date_reported DESC
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) as total_cases FROM diseases_cases GROUP BY disease_name HAVING total_cases > 5
SELECT * FROM transmission_patterns WHERE transmission_type='Airborne' AND transmission_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT disease_name, analysis_result, researcher_name FROM disease_analysis JOIN diseases_cases ON disease_analysis.disease_name = diseases_cases.disease_name
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT disease_name, transmission_mode FROM diseases WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE date_diagnosed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE disease_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, contact_number FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT disease_name, severity FROM diseases WHERE transmission_mode = 'Airborne';
SELECT patient_name, location_name FROM patients INNER JOIN locations ON patients.patient_id = locations.location_id;

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, location_name FROM patients INNER JOIN cases ON patients.patient_id = cases.patient_id INNER JOIN locations ON cases.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE cases.date_diagnosed > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cases;
SELECT disease_name, location FROM cases WHERE location='City1';
SELECT * FROM transmission ORDER BY date_transmitted DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT analysis_id, pattern_id, result FROM analysis WHERE result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM cases ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT disease_name, location FROM cases WHERE location = 'City A' ORDER BY date_occurred ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM patterns WHERE pattern_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY pattern_id;
SELECT c.case_id, t.source_location, t.destination_location, t.date_transmitted FROM cases c JOIN transmission t ON c.case_id = t.case_id;
SELECT a.analysis_id, a.pattern_id, a.description, p.pattern_name FROM analysis a JOIN patterns p ON a.pattern_id = p.pattern_id ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
